author: hboutemy
msg: changed this mojo superclass to simple AbstractMojo to avoid unnecessary configuration which hides the real target

author: mbautin
msg: [master] [0.89-fb] Optimise the ProcessServerShutdown -- enable faster meta scans through caching and by reducing lock contention; Avoid starving the delayQueue in the RegionServerOperationQueue
1) Add caching to scanMetaRegion. The earlier version used to only get 1 row
2) Optimize lock contention, by processing a bunch of in-memory updates at the
end of the loop, instead of grabbing a lock each time.
3) Drain out elements from the delayQueue, whenever they are ready to go, into
the todoQueue to ensure that they do not get starved indefinitely.

author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-5860][JIRA]splitlogmgr - do not resubmit when zk is unavailable
